body: I'm very new to Selenium RC.  I'm using .NET (though I don't think it is relevant), I have opened a page, but I want to confirm that the page was actually opened.  I have a few ideas like using .Select() or using one of the .get*() methods, but I want to do what is considered the best practice by others in the Selenium community.
title: How do I confirm a given page was displayed after calling ISelenium.open()?
